attributes.name: Force
attributes.description: Raw physical power and impact. Governs strength and direct action.

attributes.name: Arcanum
attributes.description: Magical potential and psionic resonance. Governs spellcasting and mental defense.

attributes.name: Essence
attributes.description: Life force, endurance, and connection to the world's cycles. Governs health and recovery.

attributes.name: Prowess
attributes.description: Agility, skill, and finesse in complex tasks. Governs movement and specialized actions.

attributeGeneration.method: To be determined (TBD). Will likely use a point-buy system similar to Conflict Horizon's Pentagram Attributes to enforce balance.

uniqueMechanics.name: Resonance vs. Dissonance
uniqueMechanics.description: The core conflict of the setting. Actions and powers are influenced by the character's alignment with the world's Song (harmony) or Void (chaos/decay).

uniqueMechanics.name: Dynamic Attribute Points (DAPs)
uniqueMechanics.description: A system for attribute growth and milestones, suggesting a fluid character progression.

uniqueMechanics.name: Song and Void Influences
uniqueMechanics.description: Environmental and magical effects tied to the world's balance.

usfrNotes: The core mechanical loop is the Universal D100 system. The character creation process will focus on the four core attributes and the Resonance/Dissonance alignment. The system needs a clear point-buy rule for the four attributes to enforce a balanced character concept.
